NK041(di)052:0: bkra shis kyi cho ga dpal gyi be'u bzhugs so ///
NK041(di)052:1: snang srid rnam dag chos dbyings gzhal yas su //
NK041(di)052:2: rang byung ye shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku //
NK041(di)052:3: yid 'ong nyi ma 'char ka'i lang tsho can //
NK041(di)052:4: dang po'i phyag gnyis ral gri ut+pa la //
NK041(di)052:6: tha ma'i phyag gnyis nor bu bum bzang bsnams //
NK041(di)052:7: dar dang rin chen rgyan rdzogs skyil krung bzhugs //
NK041(di)052:8: rab mdzes pad+ma zla ba'i gdan steng na //
NK041(di)052:9: dpag bsam shing la sku rgyab brten nas bzhugs //
NK041(di)052:10: bkra shis lha mo brgyad la sogs pa yi //
NK041(di)052:11: rab 'byams mchod pa'i sprin gyis mkha' dbyings 'gengs //
NK041(di)052:12: dran pa tsam gyis phun tshogs dpal yon kun //
NK041(di)052:13: yid bzhin legs par stsol ba'i bdag nyid la //
NK041(di)052:14: ma lus phyogs dus zhing gi rgyal ba dang //
NK041(di)052:15: rgyal ba'i sras bcas til gang ltar bzhugs pa'i //
NK041(di)052:16: me tog char 'bebs shis pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs //
NK041(di)052:17: ye shes 'od zer snang bas mkha' khyab gsal //
NK041(di)052:19: rang byung thugs rje'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)052:20: mkhyen brtse nus pa mtshungs med rdo rje'i sku //
NK041(di)052:21: ma lus 'gro ba'i gtan gyi mgon gyur pa //
NK041(di)052:22: skyabs mchog dam pa bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)052:23: khyod ni rang byung ye shes bde ba che //
NK041(di)052:24: ma lus chos kun khyod kyi ngang gyur kyang //
NK041(di)052:25: mi shes rgud pas mnar ba bdag cag la //
NK041(di)052:26: deng nas rtag pa dam pa'i mchog stsol cig /
NK041(di)052:27: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis bla med pa //
NK041(di)052:28: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge mtshan ldan //
NK041(di)052:29: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston rgya che ba //
NK041(di)052:30: dga' chen rol mo chen pos dbugs dbyung stsol //
NK041(di)052:31: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog gyur pa //
NK041(di)052:32: mchog sbyin rdo rjes bdag la mchog stsol zhing //
NK041(di)052:33: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi ye shes skus //
NK041(di)052:34: ye shes rdo rje'i dbang bskur bdag la stsol //
NK041(di)052:35: 'dod 'byung yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
NK041(di)052:36: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa 'gro kun gsos //
NK041(di)052:37: khyab bdag rin chen kun mchog dbul ba sel //
NK041(di)052:38: bum bzang che mchog bdag la dpal gyur cig /
NK041(di)052:39: deng nas bla med byang chub ma thob pa //
NK041(di)052:40: tshe rabs kun tu khyod kyis rjes bzung ste //
NK041(di)052:41: mi bde rgud pa thams cad rgyun chad nas //
NK041(di)052:42: dpal dang skal bzang bkra shis bde legs mdzod //
